text: Something about seeing these bits of set makes me giddy. <http://www.polygon.com/2014/7/21/5922667/star-wars-episode-vii-x-wing>

attachments.title: New Star Wars: Episode VII teaser shows the updated X-Wing
attachments.text: J.J. Abrams has become a master of slowly doling out teasers for the upcoming Star Wars Episode VII film while benefiting from the exposure the news will bring to the movie's production. Today he's...
